5.1%

options: International Energy Agency (IEA)
The International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA)
International Renewable Energy Agency (IRENA)

options: 600 million
500 million
675 million
575 million
455 million

2.4 billion
3.5 billion
3.2 billion
2.3 billion

Uncertain macroeconomic outlook
Debt distress
Climate change
Lack of financing
